minecraft:howtoplay.weapons.text.6.touch: The Trident is a dual-purpose melee and ranged weapon. Tap mobs to attack them. Press and hold the Screen to draw the trident back. Release the press to throw the trident. The Trident is the best weapon underwater.
minecraft:howtoplay.weapons.text.7: The Sword, Bow, Crossbow, and Trident have specific enchantments that you can get from the Enchanting Table or Anvil that will improve damage, durability and even light mobs on fire!
minecraft:howtoplay.worldBuilder.text.1: To place or use certain Minecraft Education blocks or items, a player must possess a special ability called 'World Builder'.
minecraft:howtoplay.worldBuilder.text.2: With cheats activated, the host can enable or disable the World Builder ability for any players in the world.
minecraft:howtoplay.worldBuilder.text.3: To grant World Builder ability to all players in the world, run the following command:
minecraft:howtoplay.worldBuilder.text.5: To quickly toggle your own World Builder ability, run either of the following commands:
minecraft:howtoplay.worldBuilder.text.8: To query your World Builder ability, run the following command:
Many blocks, like wood, can be turned into useful items by crafting. To do this, you'll find a simple §ecrafting grid§f on the right-hand side of your inventory screen.
For example, put a single wood log anywhere on the crafting grid, and several planks will appear in the §eoutput slot§f.
Simply select your shiny new planks and they will appear in your hotbar. Now you're ready to place them into the world!
Simply drag your shiny new planks to your hotbar. Now you're ready to place them into the world!
Simply tap your shiny new planks and they will appear in your hotbar. Now you're ready to place them into the world!
Some items require you to place your crafting ingredients in a certain shape - also called a §erecipe§f.
Try placing two planks above each other to create a stick. Useful for all sorts of things!

minecraft:lategameTips.1: Zombified piglins won't attack you if you have golden armor - unless you make them angry.
minecraft:lategameTips.10: A Spider Jockey is the rare appearance of a spider being ridden by a skeleton!
minecraft:lategameTips.11: Traveling one block in the Nether is equal to traveling eight blocks in the Overworld.
minecraft:lategameTips.12: Use phantom membranes to repair your elytra.
minecraft:lategameTips.13: Elytra can be used to glide, find them in End city ships!
minecraft:lategameTips.14: Test out some new features by turning on Experimental Gameplay in the settings menu!
minecraft:lategameTips.15: Monsters that are killed by skeletons arrows have a chance of dropping music discs.
minecraft:lategameTips.16: Texture packs change the way that blocks, items, and even the menus look in game. Try them out!
minecraft:lategameTips.17: Using firework rockets boosts elytra speed in mid air. Just... make sure they don't explode, otherwise it'll hurt BADLY!
minecraft:lategameTips.19: Riptide enchantment will propel you through the air in the rain.
minecraft:lategameTips.2: Hit those fireballs back at the Ghast!
minecraft:lategameTips.20: The Beacon is a powerful item that can only be crafted with a Nether star from the Wither!
minecraft:lategameTips.21: Nether stars can't be destroyed by explosions.
minecraft:lategameTips.23: Respawning in the Nether requires a charged respawn anchor.
minecraft:lategameTips.24: You can charge a respawn anchor with glowstone.
minecraft:lategameTips.25: You can breed hoglins with crimson fungus, but be careful.
minecraft:lategameTips.26: Gold is most common in the Nether and in the badlands biome.
minecraft:lategameTips.27: Diorite, you either love it or hate it.
minecraft:lategameTips.3: Cobblestone is resistant to Ghast fireballs, making it useful for guarding portals.
minecraft:lategameTips.4: Our music is by C418, Lena Raine, and Kumi Tanioka.
minecraft:lategameTips.5: There will be an update to this game eventually!
minecraft:lategameTips.6: Creepers were born from a coding bug.
minecraft:lategameTips.7: The first version of Minecraft was created in just 6 days!
minecraft:lategameTips.8: The Enderman language is actually English in reverse.
minecraft:lategameTips.9: The original name for Minecraft was Cave Game.

minecraft:menu.howToPlay.access: Press :_gamepad_face_button_down: to open How to Play!
minecraft:menu.howToPlay.access.noicon: Press [A] to open How to Play!
minecraft:menu.howToPlay.generalMessage: Minecraft encyclopedia for new and experienced players.
minecraft:menu.simulating: Simulating the world for a bit
minecraft:midgameTips.1: Iron golems will fight for you!
minecraft:midgameTips.10: Obsidian is created when water hits a lava source block.
minecraft:midgameTips.11: If the source block for water or lava is removed, it will stop the flow completely.
minecraft:midgameTips.12: Blocks that can be used as a light source will melt snow and ice.
minecraft:midgameTips.13: Take caution when building structures made of wool out in the open, as lightning from thunderstorms can set wool on fire.
minecraft:midgameTips.14: A single bucket of lava can be used in a furnace to smelt 100 blocks.
minecraft:midgameTips.15: The instrument played by a note block depends on the material beneath it.
minecraft:midgameTips.16: Attacking a wolf will cause any wolves any wolves nearby to turn hostile and attack you.
minecraft:midgameTips.17: Wolves and iron golems won't attack creepers.
minecraft:midgameTips.18: Chickens lay an egg every 5 to 10 minutes.
minecraft:midgameTips.19: Obsidian can only be mined with a diamond pickaxe.
minecraft:midgameTips.2: Feed a bone to a wolf to tame it. You can then make it sit or follow you.
minecraft:midgameTips.20: Creepers are the easiest obtainable source of gunpowder.
minecraft:midgameTips.21: Tame wolves show their health with the position of their tail. Feed them meat to heal them.
minecraft:midgameTips.22: Different colored dyes can be made from a variety of materials, cook cactus in a furnace to get green dye!
minecraft:midgameTips.23: Pigs that are struck by lightning become zombified piglins.
minecraft:midgameTips.25: Sometimes iron golems give flowers to the villager children!
minecraft:midgameTips.27: Use seagrass to attract and breed sea turtles.
minecraft:midgameTips.28: Protect baby turtles from hostile mobs!
minecraft:midgameTips.29: Baby turtles will drop scutes when they grow - these can be crafted into turtle shells.
minecraft:midgameTips.3: Wearing a pumpkin on your head will keep Endermen from attacking you.
minecraft:midgameTips.30: Brew some water breathing potions for underwater exploration!
minecraft:midgameTips.31: Dolphins can lead you to shipwrecks and underwater ruins, feed them cod and follow their trail!
minecraft:midgameTips.32: Use shears to carve a pumpkin.
minecraft:midgameTips.33: There are 3587 types of tropical fish!
minecraft:midgameTips.34: Sea pickles can be smelted into lime green dye.
minecraft:midgameTips.35: Use hay bales to breed Llamas!
minecraft:midgameTips.36: Compasses always point to the world spawn - craft one to find your way!
minecraft:midgameTips.37: Trade with villagers to obtain food, tools, and even explorer maps!
minecraft:midgameTips.38: Did you know you can hold a map in your off-hand?
minecraft:midgameTips.39: Leads can be used on boats.
minecraft:midgameTips.4: Harvest leather from cows, and use it to make armor and books.
minecraft:midgameTips.40: Sneak to walk safely on magma blocks.
minecraft:midgameTips.41: You can gather cobwebs using shears.
minecraft:midgameTips.42: Tridents are dropped by the Drowned, and can be held or thrown.
minecraft:midgameTips.43: You can smelt 20 items in a furnace by using a block of dried kelp as fuel.
minecraft:midgameTips.44: Taming a skeleton horse doesn't require a saddle.
minecraft:midgameTips.45: Phantoms are dangerous mobs that appear during the night. Make sure to sleep regularly!
minecraft:midgameTips.46: Zombies turn into drowned if they sink underwater.
minecraft:midgameTips.5: You can fill an empty bucket with water, lava, milk, powdered snow... and even some mobs.
minecraft:midgameTips.50: When digging straight up, place a torch at your feet to break any sand or gravel that could potentially fall down on you.
minecraft:midgameTips.51: Shear a Beehive or nest to get Honeycomb, use a Bottle to get honey.
minecraft:midgameTips.52: Place a campfire under a beehive or nest to harvest honey.
minecraft:midgameTips.53: Emerald ores are the rarest ores in Minecraft! They can only be found in mountains and meadows.
minecraft:midgameTips.54: Need diamonds? They get more common as you go deeper.
minecraft:midgameTips.55: Frogs eat small and blocky mobs.
minecraft:midgameTips.56: The Allay loves to collect items! If you give it a certain item it will try to collect more of it.
minecraft:midgameTips.57: Frogs pick a variant based on the temperature of the biome the tadpole grow up in.
minecraft:midgameTips.58: You can collect tadpoles in buckets.
minecraft:midgameTips.59: Ancient cities can be found under mountain ranges.
minecraft:midgameTips.6: Feeding an animal will keep it from despawning. Build a pen to keep your animals safe.
minecraft:midgameTips.60: Allays love music and therefore interact with noteblocks!
minecraft:midgameTips.61: Use a water bottle on a dirt block to get mud!
minecraft:midgameTips.62: When wandering in the deep dark, silence is key.
minecraft:midgameTips.63: Some animals will follow you if you have wheat in your hand.
minecraft:midgameTips.64: Before you mine diamonds, redstone, or gold, make sure you're using an iron or diamond pickaxe or it won't work.
minecraft:midgameTips.65: Placing two chests side by side will make one large chest.
minecraft:midgameTips.66: Can't find any coal for your torches? Try putting some logs in a furnace.
minecraft:midgameTips.68: Plant some saplings and they'll grow into trees.
minecraft:midgameTips.69: Use a hoe to prepare areas of ground for planting.
minecraft:midgameTips.7: Get to your destination faster with a minecart and some rails!
minecraft:midgameTips.8: Building a portal will allow you to travel to another dimension called the Nether.
minecraft:midgameTips.9: Bonemeal (crafted from a skeleton bone) can be used as a fertilizer and can make things grow instantly!

minecraft:resourcePack.description.botto: Behavior Packs are applied bottom to top. That means anything that is in two Behavior Packs will be overridden by the higher one.

Resource packs are applied bottom to top. This means any asset that is in two packs will be overridden by the higher pack. Packs in your worlds will apply on top of these global packs. These resources are just for you. No one else will see the resources you set here. Resource Packs in your worlds or worlds you join will apply on top of these global resources.
Resource packs are applied bottom to top. This means any asset that is in two packs will be overridden by the higher pack. These packs in your world apply on top of your global pack(s).

minecraft:store.csb.faq.answer1: Marketplace Pass is subscription service that gives you access to 150+ pieces of content from Minecraft Marketplace for %s/month.
minecraft:store.csb.faq.answer2: Select content refreshes each month so there’s always something new to explore.
minecraft:store.csb.faq.answer3: Access to Marketplace Pass requires an active subscription, and a compatible version of Minecraft: Bedrock Edition with Minecraft Marketplace. Requires Microsoft Account sign-in.
minecraft:store.csb.faq.answer4: Once a world, texture pack, skin pack, or mash-up leaves the catalog, you will need to purchase the item from the Marketplace to continue playing. Packs will not be deleted from your local storage until you delete them. Monthly character creator items you’ve redeemed are yours to keep.
minecraft:store.csb.faq.answer5: You will be able to purchase and download any world templates saved to your cloud storage within 18 months of ending your subscription unless they are no longer offered by Minecraft. Monthly character creator items you’ve redeemed are yours to keep.
minecraft:store.csb.faq.answer6: The difference between the two subscriptions is that Realms Plus includes a personal server where you can play with up to ten friends at a time. The content catalog you have access to with your Marketplace Pass subscription is the same catalog that is available with a Realms Plus subscription.
minecraft:store.csb.faq.answer7: A Realms Plus subscription includes Marketplace Pass. If you are subscribed to Marketplace Pass and want to explore Realms Plus, we suggest that you unsubscribe from Marketplace Pass first. Active Realms Plus subscribers are unable to subscribe to Marketplace Pass.
minecraft:store.csb.faq.answer8: If you purchase Marketplace Pass, you can access all the packs from any device with a  compatible version of Minecraft: Bedrock Edition with Minecraft Marketplace (sold separately) if you’re signed into your Minecraft account. Not supported on Amazon Kindle Fire or Minecraft Java Edition.
minecraft:store.csb.faq.answer9: You will be able to see content in your subscription if you are already subscribed, but you will not be able to subscribe to Marketplace Pass from the Preview/BETA build.

minecraft:store.realmsPlus.faq.answer1: Realms Plus is a subscription to a personal server supporting up to 10 simultaneous players, along with unlimited access to 150+ great Minecraft worlds, texture packs, skin packs, and mash-ups for one low monthly price.
minecraft:store.realmsPlus.faq.answer2: A personal server allows you to create a shared world that is always online and accessible from any device with Minecraft Marketplace. Players that you invite to your Realm can play this world at any time.
minecraft:store.realmsPlus.faq.answer3: Your friends don’t need to purchase a Realms Plus subscription to play on your Realm. You can invite any friend (that has their multiplayer permissions enabled) to join your Realm for free.
minecraft:store.realmsPlus.faq.answer4: Realms Plus is currently available on any platform where you can install Minecraft Bedrock Edition. You can play Realms and use any content from Realms Plus on any of these devices if you’re signed into your Microsoft Account.
minecraft:store.realmsPlus.faq.answer5: %s per month for a 10-player server and access to 150+ marketplace packs.
minecraft:store.realmsPlus.faq.answer6: New packs are added to Realms Plus monthly.
minecraft:store.realmsPlus.faq.answer7: Realms Plus members enjoy unlimited access to over 150+ great Minecraft worlds, texture packs, skin packs, and mash-ups, until either the subscription expires, or a pack leaves the catalog.
minecraft:store.realmsPlus.faq.answer8: Worlds and packs included in the subscription can either be played online, played on your personal Realm, or played on a local device. You just need to play online once every 30 days to validate that your subscription is active.
minecraft:store.realmsPlus.faq.answer9: If your subscription ends, you and your friends will no longer be able to play online together on Realms, and you will no longer have access to Realms Plus packs. You can download any world saved to your Realm (within 18 months of ending your subscription). If you used Realms Plus worlds, texture packs, or mash-ups you will need to purchase those packs in the store or, if those packs are still in Realms Plus, re-subscribe, to play those world templates.

minecraft:sunsetting.popup.pendingSunset: Our ability to support this device is coming to an end. You will continue to receive updates until Feb. of 2024, when you will receive your final update for this device.%sAfter you receive the final update, you will still be able to play on your worlds, and access Marketplace purchases (including Minecoins), however you will no longer be able to make new purchases on this device. Realms managed from this device will continue to work for 6 months unless they are updated by the Realm owner on a different device. To cancel your realm subscription, you will need to do so in your subscriptions in Google Play, you can access Google Play on any supported device or from PC where you are able to login to your account  You will no longer receive the latest updates and will be unable to play multiplayer with devices or Realms which are continuing to receive updates. You will also not be able to connect to certain servers.%sClick on the button for more information, including ways to move your world to a new device.

Our ability to support this graphics device is coming to an end. You will continue to receive updates until our next major release, whereupon you will receive your final update for this device. We deeply apologize for the inconvenience. %sAfter you receive the final update, you will still be able to play on your worlds and access Marketplace purchases (including Minecoins). Realms managed from this device will continue to work unless they are updated by the Realm owner on a different device. You will no longer receive the latest updates, and will be unable to play multiplayer with devices or Realms which are continuing to receive updates. You will also not be able to connect to certain servers. %sClick on the button for more information, including ways to move your worlds to a new device.

Our ability to support this device is coming to an end. You will continue to receive updates until our next major release, whereupon you will receive your final update for this device. However you will no longer have access to multiplayer or Realms from this device. You will no longer receive the latest updates, and will be unable to play with devices or Realms which are continuing to receive updates. You will also not be able to connect to certain servers. %sClick on the button for more information, including ways to move your worlds to a new device.

Our ability to support this device is coming to an end in your area. After you receive the final update, you will still be able to play on your worlds, and access your Marketplace purchases, but you will no longer be able to make purchases in the Marketplace. Realms managed from this device will continue to work for 6 months. On Sept. 30th, 2023 you will no longer have access to the realm. It is recommended you download your world prior to this. %sIf you have signed in with a Microsoft/Xbox Live account, your Marketplace purchases & Minecoins and your Realms subscription will be available on other platforms. If you would like to move your worlds from this device to another device, you can do so by uploading the world to a Realm, and downloading a backup onto your new device. %sClick on the button for more information, including ways to move your world to a new device.

minecraft:sunsetting.popup.sunset.dx10: This graphics device is no longer supported. You have received the final update for this device. From this point on you can keep building in your worlds, and your Marketplace purchases (including Minecoins) will continue to be available. Your Realms will continue to work unless they are updated by the Realm owner on a different device. You will no longer receive the latest updates, and will be unable to play multiplayer with devices or Realms which are continuing to receive updates. You will also not be able to connect to certain servers. %sClick on the button for more information, including ways to move your worlds to a new device. We know this is an inconvenience, and deeply appreciate the time you spent with our game, and your support.

minecraft:tips.edu.1: You can hold down Shift to take a close up picture using the Camera.
minecraft:tips.edu.10: Looking for a specific biome? Try the Library.
minecraft:tips.edu.12: In Survival Mode, players must find their own resources.
minecraft:tips.edu.13: In Creative Mode, players can freely choose to build from any of the blocks in Minecraft.
minecraft:tips.edu.14: Your code building robot helper is called the Agent.
minecraft:tips.edu.15: Redstone can be used in Minecraft to create circuits and simple machines.
minecraft:tips.edu.16: You can copy and paste from a text editor to a slate, poster, board, or into chat.
minecraft:tips.edu.17: Show hints for commonly-used keyboard and mouse controls by pressing "H" on your keyboard.
minecraft:tips.edu.18: You can toggle Auto Jump on or off in the Settings menu under Controls.
minecraft:tips.edu.19: While in Creative Mode, quickly press jump twice to fly.
minecraft:tips.edu.2: Unlike Signs, you can edit Slates, Posters, and Boards over and over again.
minecraft:tips.edu.20: Choose a Default Game Mode when creating a world to specify the type of gameplay you want.
minecraft:tips.edu.21: Use the command "/setworldspawn" to have new players begin playing where you are standing.
minecraft:tips.edu.22: Choose a default player permission when creating your world to specify the permissions you want your classmates to have when they join.
minecraft:tips.edu.23: Press "I" on your keyboard or touch the Immersive Reader icon to read or translate in-game text.
minecraft:tips.edu.24: To add or change an NPC in your world, first make yourself a world builder with "/wb".
minecraft:tips.edu.25: There's a brand new build challenge every month! Find them all in the Library under Monthly Build Challenges.
minecraft:tips.edu.26: Find related lessons by clicking on tags in the Library.
minecraft:tips.edu.27: Game moving slowly? Try turning down the render distance in Settings.
minecraft:tips.edu.28: Want to use Code Builder? Make sure cheats are toggled on.
minecraft:tips.edu.29: Press F5 to change player perspective.
minecraft:tips.edu.3: Use Ctrl+B to turn on text-to-speech capabilities for in-game chat.
minecraft:tips.edu.30: Use "/spawnpoint" to change your spawn point. It's just like you slept in a bed!
minecraft:tips.edu.4: You can export your Minecraft world to share it with others.
minecraft:tips.edu.5: To have your peers connect to your world, pause your game and share your join code.
minecraft:tips.edu.6: Remember that to use slash commands, you need to enable cheats in your world.
minecraft:tips.edu.7: Done with your creation? Have others tour your world as visitors to protect your work.
minecraft:tips.edu.8: To code in Minecraft, press "C" on your keyboard or touch the Agent icon at the top of your screen.
minecraft:tips.edu.9: Use the Library to find new game worlds to build in.
minecraft:tips.game.1: Use seagrass to attract and breed sea turtles.
minecraft:tips.game.10: Sea pickles can be smelted into lime green dye.
minecraft:tips.game.12: Compasses point to the world spawn - craft one to find your way back!
minecraft:tips.game.13: Trade with villagers to obtain food, tools, and even treasure maps!
minecraft:tips.game.14: Did you know you can hold a map in your off-hand?
minecraft:tips.game.15: Leads can be used on boats.
minecraft:tips.game.16: Sneak or wear frost walker boots to walk safely on magma blocks.
minecraft:tips.game.17: You can gather cob webs using shears.
minecraft:tips.game.18: Need diamonds? They get more common as you go deeper.
minecraft:tips.game.19: Before you mine diamonds, redstone or gold, make sure you're using an iron, diamond, or netherite pickaxe or the ore won't drop.
minecraft:tips.game.2: Protect baby turtles from hostile mobs!
minecraft:tips.game.20: Need coal for torches or fuel? Try smelting wood logs in a furnace to make charcoal!
minecraft:tips.game.21: Gold is more abundant in Badlands biomes!
minecraft:tips.game.22: Elytra can be used to glide, find them in End City ships!
minecraft:tips.game.23: Test out some new features by turning on some Experiments!
minecraft:tips.game.24: Tridents are dropped by the Drowned, and can be held or thrown.
minecraft:tips.game.25: You can breed Hoglins with Crimson Fungus, but it is dangerous!
minecraft:tips.game.26: You can smelt 20 items in a furnace by using a block of dried kelp as fuel.
minecraft:tips.game.27: Creepers that are killed by skeletons' arrows have a chance of dropping music discs.
minecraft:tips.game.28: People like YOU make Marketplace content!
minecraft:tips.game.29: Did you know that several community creators make a living off the content in the Marketplace?
minecraft:tips.game.3: Baby turtles will drop scutes when they grow - these can be crafted into turtle shells.
minecraft:tips.game.30: You can find skins to customize your experience in-game, or on select platforms use your own!
minecraft:tips.game.31: Texture packs change the way that blocks, items, and even the menus look in game. Try them out!
minecraft:tips.game.32: Check out the Marketplace to find new worlds and adventures.
minecraft:tips.game.33: Apply to become a Marketplace Creator!
minecraft:tips.game.34: Mash-up packs come with a world to explore, skins, textures, and even new music.
minecraft:tips.game.35: Did you know there are over 500 community-created Marketplace packs with more added every week?
minecraft:tips.game.37: Emerald ores are the rarest ores in Minecraft! They can only be found in mountains and meadows!
minecraft:tips.game.38: Taming a skeleton horse doesn't require a saddle.
minecraft:tips.game.4: Use a bed to set your respawn point during the day.
minecraft:tips.game.40: Diorite, you either love it or hate it.
minecraft:tips.game.41: Phantoms are dangerous mobs that appear during the night. Make sure to sleep regularly!
minecraft:tips.game.42: Zombies turn into Drowned if they sink underwater.
minecraft:tips.game.43: Minecraft Live takes place every year! Look out for the next one!
minecraft:tips.game.44: Using fireworks boosts elytra speed in mid air. Just... make sure they don't explode, otherwise it'll hurt BADLY!
minecraft:tips.game.45: Gold is most common in the Nether and Badlands biomes.
minecraft:tips.game.5: Brew some water breathing potions for underwater exploration!
minecraft:tips.game.50: Riptide enchantment will propel you through the air in the rain.
minecraft:tips.game.51: Minecraft Live is a worldwide interactive live-streaming event. Grab your items and join the party!
minecraft:tips.game.53: The Beacon is a powerful item that can only be crafted with a nether star from the Wither!
minecraft:tips.game.55: Did you know that nether stars can't be destroyed by explosions?
minecraft:tips.game.56: When digging straight up, place a torch at your feet to break any sand or gravel that could potentially fall down on you.
minecraft:tips.game.58: Shear a Beehive or nest to get Honeycomb, use a Bottle to get honey.
minecraft:tips.game.59: Place a Campfire under a Beehive or nest to harvest honey peacefully. Your bees will thank you.
minecraft:tips.game.6: Dolphins can lead you to shipwrecks and underwater ruins, feed them cod and follow their trail!
minecraft:tips.game.60: Respawning in the Nether requires a charged Respawn Anchor.
minecraft:tips.game.61: You can charge a Respawn Anchor with Glowstone.
minecraft:tips.game.63: Allays can be found in Pillager Outposts and Woodland Mansions.
minecraft:tips.game.64: The Allay loves to collect items! If you give it a certain item it will try to collect more of it.
minecraft:tips.game.65: Allays love music and therefore interact with Noteblocks!
minecraft:tips.game.66: Ancient cities can be found under mountain ranges.
minecraft:tips.game.67: When wandering in Deep Dark, silence is key.
minecraft:tips.game.68: Use a water bottle on a dirt block to get mud!
minecraft:tips.game.69: Frogs eat small and blocky mobs.
minecraft:tips.game.7: Use shears to carve a pumpkin.
minecraft:tips.game.70: Frogs pick a variant based on the temperature of the biome the tadpole grow up in.
minecraft:tips.game.71: You can collect tadpoles in buckets.
minecraft:tips.game.72: Explore structures throughout the Minecraft world to find smithing templates to trim your armor pieces.
minecraft:tips.game.73: Need more smithing templates? Try to copy them.
minecraft:tips.game.74: The sniffer egg seems to like moss blocks.
minecraft:tips.game.75: Mob heads make sounds, try them out on note blocks!
minecraft:tips.game.76: Some sand might be suspicious. Use your brush on it to find some good stuff!
minecraft:tips.game.77: Two players can ride together on a camel.
minecraft:tips.game.8: Use phantom membranes to repair your elytra.
minecraft:tips.game.9: There are 3587 types of tropical fish!
minecraft:tips.realms.1: Take a screenshot using the Game menu.
minecraft:tips.realms.2: A Realm is always online, so you and your friends can play here whenever you want.
minecraft:title.oldgl1: Old graphics card detected; this may prevent you from
minecraft:title.oldgl2: playing in the future as OpenGL 2.0 will be required.
minecraft:translation.test.complex: Prefix, %s%2$s again %s and %1$s lastly %s and also %1$s again!

minecraft:trial.collection.3.title: Wildlife: Savanna
minecraft:trial.collection.4.description: Explore Noxcrew's magical world full of ancient castles!
minecraft:trial.collection.4.title: Adventurer's Dream
minecraft:trial.collection.5.description: Transform your Minecraft world into a comic!
minecraft:trial.collection.5.title: PureBDcraft Pack
minecraft:trial.collection.6.description: Vast tropical wilderness on a whirlwind hunt for treasure!
minecraft:trial.collection.6.title: Relics of Privateers
minecraft:trial.collection.7.description: Explore an ancient world, texture pack and skins!
minecraft:trial.collection.7.title: Greek Mythology Mash-up
minecraft:trial.collection.8.description: Playgrounds filled with games and challenges!
minecraft:trial.collection.8.title: Winter Mini-Games Festival
minecraft:trial.collection.9.description: Get ready for an explosion of rainbow pastel happiness!
minecraft:trial.collection.9.title: Pastel Skin Pack
minecraft:trial.creative.mode.1.intro_de: Build anything you can imagine in Creative Mode. Take no damage, fly through the skies, and enjoy instant access to every block in the game! This mode lets you focus on crafting and gives you everything you need to build something beautiful!
minecraft:trial.creative.mode.2.intro_de: You'll also have access to Inspiration Island, a tutorial world and introduction to Creative mode that'll teach you how to be a master builder in no time! You can find more great worlds like this in Minecraft Marketplace.
minecraft:trial.creative.mode.title: CREATIVE
minecraft:trial.master.collection.title: Minecraft Master Collection
minecraft:trial.master.offer: Get Minecraft, 1000 Minecoins, 4 skin packs, 2 texture packs, 3 maps, and 1 mash-up
minecraft:trial.noInvitesOrJoining: To play with friends please purchase the full game
minecraft:trial.starter.collection.title: Minecraft Starter Collection
minecraft:trial.starter.offer: Get Minecraft, 700 Minecoins, 2 skin packs, 1 texture pack and 1 mash-up
minecraft:trial.survival.mode.1.intro_de: The original Minecraft experience: collect resources to craft tools and build structures, find and farm food to manage your hunger, battle dangerous mobs, and explore a vast world.
minecraft:trial.survival.mode.2.intro_de: Start by collecting some wood and dirt for a makeshift home to help you survive the first night! From there it's all up to you.
minecraft:trial.survival.mode.title: SURVIVAL
minecraft:trial.tabbed_upsell.achievemen: In addition to the full Minecraft experience with Creative mode, Multiplayer, and more, you'll earn Achievements and a Gamerscore to mark your Minecraft progress and show your Microsoft Account friends your accomplishments. Get the full game to start earning them!
minecraft:trial.tabbed_upsell.addon.desc: Want to make wolves act like bunnies? Turn all the trees into cotton candy? You can alter everything in the full Minecraft experience with add-ons! Plus get access to Multiplayer, Creative mode, Achievements and more! Buy Minecraft now for full access!
minecraft:trial.tabbed_upsell.creative.d: Buy Minecraft and get Creative mode! Access the entire inventory - the only limit to what you can build is your imagination! Fly around your world, make your dream home out of anything and everything, or just blow up a mountain with unlimited TNT!
Endlessly explore your own unique worlds and construct anything you can imagine - from the simplest of homes to the grandest of castles! Play Creative mode to build wonders with unlimited resources. Or mine in Survival mode, crafting weapons and armor to fend off dangerous mobs and survive the nights. Plus, play with friends online! Unlock the full game today!
minecraft:trial.tabbed_upsell.multiplaye: The full Minecraft experience lets you enjoy Creative mode, Achievements and Multiplayer with your friends across Minecraft devices! Play with friends on console, PC and mobile to create, explore and survive together. Unlock the full Minecraft experience today!
minecraft:trial.tabbed_upsell.seeds.desc: Unlock the full Minecraft experience and get access to Seeds! Seeds help you discover new biomes - survive on ice plains, ascend extreme hills, or trek across deserts. Start with unique templates or explore random new worlds! Access Seeds, Creative mode, Multiplayer and more by buying Minecraft today!
minecraft:trial.tabbed_upsell.server.des: Servers offer some of the most creative ways to enjoy Minecraft! Play great mini-games, meet the Minecraft community and make new friends. Unlock the full Minecraft experience to try Servers today!
minecraft:trial.tabbed_upsell.store.desc: Get access to Minecraft Marketplace, our in-game store. Switch up your look with new skins, change your world, or explore incredible new maps from the best community creators! Get the full game today!
minecraft:trial.tabbed_upsell.title: Unlock Full Game
minecraft:trial.tabbed_upsell.xbl.descri: With the full Minecraft experience you get Creative mode, Achievements, and more, plus with a Microsoft Account you can meet others in the Minecraft community! Join your friends' worlds, make new friends on Servers, and sync your Marketplace purchases to everywhere you play Minecraft.
minecraft:trial.tabbed_upsell.xbl.title: MICROSOFT ACCOUNT
minecraft:trial.thanks_for_testing.achie: In addition to the full Minecraft experience with Creative mode, Multiplayer, and more, you'll earn Achievements and a Gamerscore to mark your Minecraft progress and show your Microsoft Account friends your accomplishments.
minecraft:trial.thanks_for_testing.addon: Want to make wolves act like bunnies? Turn all the trees into cotton candy? You can alter everything in the full Minecraft experience with add-ons! Plus get access to Multiplayer, Creative mode, Achievements and more!
minecraft:trial.thanks_for_testing.creat: A beloved part of the full Minecraft experience: Creative mode! Access the entire inventory - the only limit to what you can build is your imagination! Fly around your world, make your dream home out of anything and everything, or just blow up a mountain with unlimited TNT!
minecraft:trial.thanks_for_testing.minec: Thank you for downloading the Minecraft Trial for Chromebook! Your playtesting will provide invaluable data for bug fixes and technical troubleshooting. Uncover a bug? Report it at bugs.mojang.com! Other questions? Check out our FAQ.
minecraft:trial.thanks_for_testing.multi: The full Minecraft experience lets you enjoy Creative mode, Achievements and Multiplayer with your friends across Minecraft devices! Play with friends on console, PC and mobile to create, explore and survive together.
minecraft:trial.thanks_for_testing.seeds: The full Minecraft experience unlocks access to Seeds! Seeds help you discover new biomes - survive on ice plains, ascend extreme hills, or trek across deserts. Start with unique templates or explore random new worlds!
minecraft:trial.thanks_for_testing.serve: As a part of the full Minecraft experience, Servers offer some of the most creative ways to enjoy Minecraft! Play great mini-games, meet the Minecraft community and make new friends.
minecraft:trial.thanks_for_testing.store: The full game allows access to Minecraft Marketplace, our in-game store. Switch up your look with new skins, change your world, or explore incredible new maps from the best community creators!
minecraft:trial.thanks_for_testing.title: Thanks for Testing
minecraft:trial.thanks_for_testing.xbl.d: With the full Minecraft experience, you get Creative mode, Achievements, and more, plus with a Microsoft Account you can meet others in the Minecraft community! You’ll be able to join friends’ worlds, make new friends on Servers, and sync your Marketplace purchases to everywhere you play Minecraft.
minecraft:trial.upsell.cb.description.wo: Explore, craft, build, and have fun! In this trial world, you will have 90 minutes of play time. Uncover a bug? Report it at bugs.mojang.com! Other questions? Check out our FAQ.
(Trial worlds do not transfer to the full game.)
minecraft:trial.upsell.cb.expiredNewDesc: Do you want to continue exploring, crafting, and building? Start a new trial world to continue playing!
minecraft:trial.upsell.description: In this trial you are limited to 90 minutes of play time. Craft, build, explore, and have fun! Your world will be preserved if you choose to purchase the full version.
minecraft:trial.upsell.description.updat: Explore, craft, build, and have fun! In this trial you will have 90 minutes of play time. Unlock the full game to continue playing as long as you want!
minecraft:trial.upsell.description.world: Explore, craft, build, and have fun! In this trial you will have 90 minutes of play time. Unlock the full game to play an infinite amount of worlds for as long as you want!*
*(This world will not transfer to the full game)
minecraft:trial.upsell.expiredDescriptio: Time has expired. Please purchase to unlock the full game:
minecraft:trial.upsell.expiredNewDescrip: Do you want to continue exploring, crafting, and building? Unlock the full game to play as long as you want! This world will be saved for you to pick up where you left off but you can't modify it until you unlock the full game.
Do you want to continue exploring, crafting, and building? Unlock the full game to play an infinite amount of worlds for as long as you want!*

If you lose your system or uninstall Minecraft, your purchases will still be synced and accessible on any system when you use your Microsoft account.

minecraft:xbl.signOut.message2: Are you sure you want to do this?
minecraft:xbl.signOut.title: Microsoft Account Purchases!
minecraft:xbl.skipSignIn.prompt.descript: This Microsoft Account will not be the primary account for this device if you do not transfer this device's purchases to this account. You will not automatically sign in when you start Minecraft.
minecraft:xbl.skipSignIn.prompt.title: Temporary Account
minecraft:xbl.syncIAP.confirmSync.prompt: Would you like to sync your app store purchases to %s?
Packs purchased outside Minecraft Marketplace can only be synced once. They will continue to be available to anyone who plays on this device.
minecraft:xbl.syncIAP.description: Sign in to a Microsoft Account to sync your Skins, Texture Packs, Worlds, and Mash-ups. They will be there for you on any device where you play Minecraft.
minecraft:xbl.syncIAP.inProgress.message: Syncing purchases to your Microsoft Account…
This Microsoft Account will not be the primary account for this device if you do not sync this device's purchases to this account. You will not automatically sign in when you start Minecraft.
minecraft:xbl.syncIAP.title: Sync purchases to your Microsoft Account?
minecraft:xbl.syncIAP.toast.message: Purchases synced to your Microsoft Account!
minecraft:xbl.syncIAP.toast.title: Success!
minecraft:xbox.achievementssignin.line1: Achievements and Gamerscore mark your progress through Minecraft.
minecraft:xbox.achievementssignin.line2: Sign in with a Microsoft Account to start earning them!
minecraft:xbox.addfriendsignin.line1: Find your friends by their Gamertag to see when they are online.
minecraft:xbox.addfriendsignin.line2: Sign in with a Microsoft Account to start adding friends!
minecraft:xbox.dev_wrongSandboxSigninFai: Failed to sign in to %s sandbox. Please change sandboxes and restart Minecraft or sign in with a different account. Sandbox will be %s on restart.
minecraft:xbox.disconectionscreen.access: You must be friends with someone in this game in order to join.
minecraft:xbox.disconectionscreen.multip: This Microsoft Account does not have permission to join multiplayer games.
minecraft:xbox.disconectionscreen.notSig: Sign in with your Microsoft Account to play with friends.
minecraft:xbox.externalServer.line1: Servers offer some of the most creative ways to play Minecraft! We just need you to sign in so that we can make sure you have permission to play online with new people.
minecraft:xbox.externalServer.title: Play on a Server
minecraft:xbox.failedsignin.body: We could not sign you into your Microsoft Account. Access to Realms, Profiles, and your Marketplace items will be limited. Please try again later.
minecraft:xbox.firstsignin.line1: Welcome to Minecraft! Use a Microsoft Account to start connecting with the Minecraft community, where PCs, consoles, phones, and tablets can all play together. And the best part?
minecraft:xbox.firstsignin.line3: Don't have an account? Create one now to earn achievements and join Realms and Servers!
minecraft:xbox.firstsignin.line3.norealm: Don't have an account? Create one now to earn achievements and play with your cross-platform friends!
minecraft:xbox.genericsignin.line1: Your Minecraft account lets you play online multiplayer with friends on PCs and mobile devices. And the best part?
minecraft:xbox.genericsignin.line3: You can use it anywhere you play Minecraft.
minecraft:xbox.invitesignin.line1: Invite your friends by their Gamertag to see their worlds when they are online.
minecraft:xbox.invitesignin.line2: Sign in with a Microsoft Account to start inviting friends!
minecraft:xbox.profile.addFriend.success: Success! %s was added to your friend list.
minecraft:xbox.profile.errorModal: An issue occurred while attempting to open the Player profile. Error Code: %d
minecraft:xbox.profile.favoriteHelperTex: Favorite friends go first on your friends list. You'll see when they go online or start broadcasting.
minecraft:xbox.profile.friendHelperText: Follow %s. After you both are friends, you can invite them to your game.
minecraft:xbox.profile.realName: Manage your privacy settings for sharing your real name in the Xbox app.
minecraft:xbox.report.impersonatingStaff: Impersonating staff, Player Support, or Community representatives
minecraft:xbox.report.postLinkToInapprop: Posting links to inappropriate content or malicious software
minecraft:xbox.report.toastError: We were unable to send your report. Try again soon.
minecraft:xbox.report.whereReport: Where did you observe the bad behavior?
minecraft:xbox.report.whereReportDescrip: Please let us know where the incident took place. This will help us in researching your case.
minecraft:xbox.signOutLong: Sign out of your Microsoft Account
minecraft:xbox.signin.beta.blocked: Signing in with a Microsoft Account is not available on the beta at this time.
minecraft:xbox.signin.enterCode.qr: 2. Enter the code below when prompted:
minecraft:xbox.signin.error: Please sign in with your Microsoft Account to play with friends, earn gamerscore and achievements.
minecraft:xbox.signin.error.pocket.line1: Thanks for testing Realms! The features are not final and you might run into bugs. Send us feedback! We're listening.
minecraft:xbox.signin.error.pocket.line3: During this test, everyone will need to sign in with a Microsoft Account so they can be sent invites and added to Realms.
minecraft:xbox.signin.message: Sign in with your Free Microsoft Account to experience the full world of Minecraft.
minecraft:xbox.signin.newaccount.info: Your friends and their friends can see if you're online. your game clips, and your recent apps and games. You can change these on Xbox.com.
minecraft:xbox.signin.qr.account: Sign in with a free Microsoft Account to play online with your friends across platforms
minecraft:xbox.signin.qr.left.body: Use your camera app or a QR code reader on your device.
minecraft:xbox.signin.useDifferentAccoun: Sign in with a different Microsoft Account
minecraft:xbox.signin.warning.kickPlayer: This will send you back to the main menu. Continue?
minecraft:xbox.signin.website: Visit this website on another device:
minecraft:xbox.signin.website.qr: 1. Visit this website on another device:
minecraft:xbox.signingin: Signing in with your Microsoft Account...
minecraft:xbox.thirdpartysignin.line1: Awesome mini-games and new players are waiting for you! But first, '%s' would like to know who you are.
minecraft:xbox.thirdpartysignin.line2: You need to sign in with a Microsoft Account to connect!
